column2: Nova Lifestyle, Inc. designs, markets and manufactures modern home furniture. The company is headquartered in Commerce, California and currently employs 33 full-time employees. The firm operates through the design, manufacture and sale of furniture segment. The firm monitors trending and work to create design elements that are then integrated into its product lines that can be used as standalone, as well as whole room and home furnishing solutions. Through its global network, the Company also sells (through a third-party manufacturing partner) a range of bedding foundation components. Its LifeStyle brand family includes Diamond Sofa (www.diamondsofa.com), Colorful World, Giorgio Mobili and Bright Swallow International Group Limited (Bright Swallow). The firm's customers principally consist of distributors and retailers having a specific geographic coverage that deploy middle to high-end private label home furnishings.
